patthana14.2:1.1_0: Sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana14.2:1.1_1: paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko
patthana14.2:1.1_2: ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.2:2.1_0: Ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana14.2:2.1_1: paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko
patthana14.2:2.1_2: ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.2:3.1_0: Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañca
patthana14.2:3.1_1: ahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañca ahetukañca
patthana14.2:3.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.2:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
